title: How to Freeze Liquid Coffee Creamer

steps.headline: Add your coffee creamer containers in your freezer.
steps.description: Make sure that you place the new ones in the back, while the old ones in the front. You can also mark the tops with labeled tape or marker noting the date that you have purchased them.

steps.headline: Transfer the earliest dated or first one from the freezer to the refrigerator immediately.
Allow it to thaw for about a day or two.
Open the container as usual.
steps.description: Always be sure to shake well before using every time.

text: Add your coffee creamer containers in your freezer. Make sure that you place the new ones in the back, while the old ones in the front. You can also mark the tops with labeled tape or marker noting the date that you have purchased them. Transfer the earliest dated or first one from the freezer to the refrigerator immediately.  Allow it to thaw for about a day or two.  Open the container as usual. Always be sure to shake well before using every time.
